mapper.sql: factory_id, factory_no, legalperson, factory_name, factory_usedname, factory_size, county_id, industry_bigid, industry_id, address, power_amount, address_register, countyid_register, factory_longitude, factory_latitude, source_type, year, last_changed_time, audit_time, filling_time, Year_days, Days_hours, total_output, status, principal_name, principal_phone, principal_mobile, principal_email, lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, lat3, lon3, lat4, lon4, lat5, lon5, lat6, lon6, lat7, lon7, exhaust_count, boiler_count, kiln_count, device_count, device_product_count, device_raw_count, rongji_product_count, rongji_raw_count, feiqi_count, soil_dust_count, con_dust_count, road_dust_count, yard_dust_count, no_org_work_count, flag, important
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT factory.factory_id, factory.factory_no, factory.factory_name, factory.factory_latitude, factory.factory_longitude, factory.source_type, factory.`year`, factory.county_id, county.COUNTY_NAME, county.city_code, city.city_name, factory.`status`, `status`.introduction AS statusdec FROM factory LEFT JOIN county ON factory.county_id=county.county_id LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code LEFT JOIN `status` ON factory.`status`=`status`.id ) factory ORDER BY factory.`status` DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ss.*,county.city_code AS register_city FROM( SELECT factory.*,county.city_code FROM factory LEFT JOIN county ON factory.county_id=county.county_id )ss LEFT JOIN county ON ss.countyid_register=county.COUNTY_ID )factory WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ss.*,county.city_code AS register_city FROM( SELECT factory.*,county.city_code FROM factory LEFT JOIN county ON factory.county_id=county.county_id )ss LEFT JOIN county ON ss.countyid_register=county.COUNTY_ID )factory WHERE factory_id < #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY factory_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ss.*,county.city_code AS register_city FROM( SELECT factory.*,county.city_code FROM factory LEFT JOIN county ON factory.county_id=county.county_id )ss LEFT JOIN county ON ss.countyid_register=county.COUNTY_ID )factory WHERE factory_id >#{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY factory_id ASC LIMIT 1
select count(*) from factory where factory_no = #{factoryNo}

SELECT COUNT(factory.factory_id) AS value,city.city_name AS name FROM county LEFT JOIN factory ON county.COUNTY_ID=factory.county_id INNER JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code GROUP BY county.city_code

SELECT COUNT(factory.factory_id) AS value,CONCAT(city.city_name,'-',county.COUNTY_NAME )AS name FROM county INNER JOIN factory ON county.COUNTY_ID=factory.county_id INNER JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code GROUP BY county.COUNTY_ID ORDER BY city.city_code

mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO factory (factory_no, year,factory_name,county_id,address,address_register,factory_longitude,factory_latitude) VALUES
factory_no = #{item.factoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, year = #{item.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, factory_name = #{item.factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_id = #{item.countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{item.address,jdbcType=CHAR}, address_register = #{item.addressRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_longitude = #{item.factoryLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, factory_latitude = #{item.factoryLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
